summary: Replaces vanilla eye textures with new, vivid ones.
descriptionHtml:
Update 1.2
-------------
Instead of revising the Argonian eyes, I decided to revise the Dark Elf and High Elf eyes. Mainly because it wasn\'t clear what I could do to improve the Argonian eyes...they already looked fine to me; so if anyone has any ideas about that, let me know. I also added the bloodshot eye variations, as well as made some slight alterations to the green and ice blue eyes in the \"Lesser Vivid\" version to ensure that they weren\'t popping out too much.


Update 1.1
--------------
Revised the Yellow, Grey, Light Grey, Dark Blue, and Vampiric eyes. That should be all of the eyes for the human races...with the exception of the bloodshot ones, which I\'m not sure anyone even uses...anyway, I\'ll most likely start on revising the Argonian eyes next.




Description
--------------
Since many times while playing Skyrim I had trouble seeing even which color my character\'s eyes were, I decided it might be a good idea to revitalize some of them.
 
That\'s exactly what I\'ve done here. Note that this mod doesn\'t replace all the eye textures, but mainly only replaces some of the less noticeable eyes that the human type races had. It also doubles the resolution size of the eyes that I\'ve edited, allowing for more detail.



Installation:
-------------

Extract the \"textures\" folder from the zip file into your \"Data\" folder inside your Skyrim directory.
author: Sephiex
